item.title: My First Post
item.description: MathJax.Hub.Config({tex2jax: { inlineMath: [['$','$'], ['\\(','\\)']], displayMath: [['$$','$$']], skipTags: ["script","noscript","style","textarea","pre"], processEnvironments: true }}); I finally got GitHub working as a host for the site! Starting this Friday, I’m going to start posting weekly research updates, to both track my progress and work on my techinical writing skills. I even got $z = x^2 + y^2$ working.
item.content:
I finally got GitHub working as a host for the site! Starting this Friday, I’m going to start posting weekly research updates, to both track my progress and work on my techinical writing skills.

I even got $z = x^2 + y^2$ working.
